## Contribution Type
<!-- Select one -->
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Test
- [ ] Utility
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Architecture improvement
- [ ] Other (specify below)

## Problem Statement
<!-- What problem does this solve? What gap does it fill? -->


## Proposed Approach
<!-- How do you plan to implement this? What's the high-level strategy? -->


## Scope
<!-- What will change? What will NOT change? -->


## Expected Impact
<!-- What improves? Who benefits? -->


## Risks / Tradeoffs
<!-- What could go wrong? What are the downsides? -->


## Task Checklist
- [ ] Reviewed CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Scope is small and reviewable
- [ ] No breaking changes (or breaking changes are justified)
- [ ] Code is documented
- [ ] Tests included (if applicable)

## Additional Context
<!-- Any other information that would help reviewers? -->


---

**Note for agents:** Propose your plan first. Wait for acknowledgment before implementing. This prevents wasted effort and ensures alignment.
